creator: stevesunypoly
title: TiddlyWiki Firefox setup
text:
If you're using [[Firefox for Android]], see the instructions for [[Saving with TiddlyFox on Android]].

# Ensure you have the latest version of [[Firefox]]
#* http://getfirefox.com
# Install the latest release of the TiddlyFox extension from:
#* https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tiddlyfox/
# Restart [[Firefox]]
# {{SetFileSavePreferences}}

creator: stevesunypoly
text:
# Complete the [[TiddlyWiki Firefox setup]] and establsy a [[Tiddlywiki File Repository]].
# Download an empty TiddlyWiki into your [[Tiddlywiki File Repository]], renaming it as "yourname-firstwiki" (replacing //yourname// with your name).
#> {{$:/editions/tw5.com/snippets/download-empty-button}}
# Open the file in [[Firefox]] using file/open or by navigating to your [[Tiddlywiki File Repository]] and clicking open from there
# Click ''OK'' in response to the prompt from TiddlyFox that asks whether to enable saving for this file
# Create a new tiddler using the ''plus'' {{$:/core/images/new-button}} button in the sidebar. Name the new tiddler with your name written in CamelCase, and write some content in the text box. Click the {{$:/core/images/done-button}} ''checkmark'' button to save the tiddler.
# Save your changes by clicking the {{$:/core/images/save-button}} ''Save changes'' button in the sidebar
#* Look for the yellow notification ''Saved wiki'' at the top right of the window
# Refresh the browser window to verify that your changes have been saved correctly (you may have to navigate to the "Recent" sidebar menu). If the changes to your wiki are not visible, you may need to clear browsing content.
# Share a link to the Web version (beginning with http://) of your wiki in the [[Form for SharingTiddlyWikis]]
title: Create your first TiddlyWiki

creator: stevesunypoly
title: Tiddlywiki File Repository
text:
* Dropbox

* github

* Any other Web server

creator: stevesunypoly
text:
# Complete the [[TiddlyWiki Firefox setup]] and establsy a [[Tiddlywiki File Repository]].
# Download an empty TiddlyWiki into your [[Tiddlywiki File Repository]], renaming it as "yourname-firstwiki" (replacing //yourname// with your name).
#> {{$:/editions/tw5.com/snippets/download-empty-button}}
# Open the file in [[Firefox]] using file/open or by navigating to your [[Tiddlywiki File Repository]] and clicking open from there
# Click ''OK'' in response to the prompt from TiddlyFox that asks whether to enable saving for this file
# Create a new tiddler using the ''plus'' {{$:/core/images/new-button}} button in the sidebar. Name the new tiddler with your name written in CamelCase, and write some content in the text box. Click the {{$:/core/images/done-button}} ''checkmark'' button to save the tiddler.
# Drag this [[link into your new TiddlyWiki file
# Save your changes by clicking the {{$:/core/images/save-button}} ''Save changes'' button in the sidebar
#* Look for the yellow notification ''Saved wiki'' at the top right of the window
# Refresh the browser window to verify that your changes have been saved correctly (you may have to navigate to the "Recent" sidebar menu). If the changes to your wiki are not visible, you may need to clear browsing content.
# Share a link to the Web version (beginning with http://) of your wiki in the [[Form for SharingTiddlyWikis]]
title: Draft of 'Create your first TiddlyWiki'
draft.title: Create your first TiddlyWiki
